mapper.select: select f.*,fkbt.name as phenomenonTypeName from fault f LEFT JOIN fault_knowledge_base_type fkbt on f.fault_phenomenon = f.code where f.code = #{code}

SELECT f.sub_system_code as subSystemCode, count(*) AS number FROM fault f
1 = 1
and DATE_FORMAT(f.happen_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(f.happen_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY f.sub_system_code
select CONCAT(cs.line_name, '/', cs.station_name) as lineStationName from cs_station cs where cs.station_code = #{stationCode} and cs.del_flag = 0
select sdt.item_text from sys_dict_item sdt LEFT JOIN sys_dict sd on sd.id = sdt.dict_id where sd.dict_code = 'fault_status' and sdt.item_value = #{status}
